nodes.text: Jerethian clamberwolf were a highly intelligent species of wolf native to Jereth VI.

Jerethian clamberwolves were large canine predators at the top of the food chain in the forests of Jereth VI. This was due in large part to their intelligence and natural ability to climb the trees when hunting. They were also adept at ambushing tactics, leaving their prey nowhere to escape where the beasts would then use their sharp claws and teeth to take down even large animals. Their aggressive nature and intelligence made the clamberwolf virtually impossible to train and difficult to even study.
